targets.query: select last(uptime) from system where  host =~ /^$host$/
SELECT mean("n_cpus") FROM "system" WHERE "host" =~ /^$host$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval) fill(null)
SELECT last("total") FROM "mem" WHERE "host" =~ /^$host$/
SELECT last("total") FROM "processes" WHERE "host" =~ /^$host$/
SELECT last("total_threads") FROM "processes" WHERE "host" =~ /^$host$/
SELECT last("load1") AS load FROM "system" WHERE "host" =~ /^$host$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval)
SELECT last("load5") FROM "system" WHERE "host" =~ /^$host$/
SELECT last("load15") FROM "system" WHERE "host" =~ /^$host$/
SELECT last(used_percent) FROM "mem" WHERE "host" =~ /^$host$/
SELECT max(used_percent) FROM "disk" WHERE "host" =~ /^$host$/ and "device" != 'rootfs'  and $timeFilter
SELECT mean("load1") FROM "system" WHERE "host" =~ /^$host$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval) fill(null)
SELECT mean("load5") FROM "system" WHERE "host" =~ /^$host$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval) fill(null)
SELECT mean("load15") FROM "system" WHERE "host" =~ /^$host$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval) fill(null)
select blocked,running,sleeping,total,total_threads,zombies from processes where  host =~ /^$host$/ and $timeFilter
SELECT non_negative_derivative(mean("bytes_recv"), 1s)*8 AS "IN" FROM "net" WHERE $timeFilter  and "host" =~ /^$host$/   GROUP BY time($interval), "interface" fill(null)
SELECT non_negative_derivative(mean("bytes_sent"), 1s)*-8 AS "OUT" FROM "net" WHERE $timeFilter  and "host" =~ /^$host$/ GROUP BY time($interval), "interface" fill(null)

SELECT max(tcp_established) AS "TCP established", 
max(tcp_syn_sent) AS "TCP SYN Sent", 
max(tcp_syn_recv) AS "TCP SYN Recv", 
max(tcp_fin_wait1) AS "TCP FIN Wait1", 
max(tcp_fin_wait2) AS "TCP FIN Wait2", 
max(tcp_time_wait) AS "TCP Time Wait", 
max(tcp_close) AS "TCP Close", 
max(tcp_close_wait) AS "TCP Close Wait", 
max(tcp_last_ack) AS "TCP Last ACK", 
max(tcp_listen) AS "TCP Listen", 
max(tcp_closing) AS "TCP Closing", 
max(tcp_none) AS "TCP None",
max(udp_socket) AS "UDP Sockets"
FROM "netstat" WHERE $timeFilter and "host" =~ /^$host$/ GROUP BY time($interval) fill(null)

SELECT max(tcp_established) AS "TCP established", 
max(tcp_syn_sent) AS "TCP SYN Sent", 
max(tcp_syn_recv) AS "TCP SYN Recv", 
max(tcp_fin_wait1) AS "TCP FIN Wait1", 
max(tcp_fin_wait2) AS "TCP FIN Wait2", 
max(tcp_time_wait) AS "TCP Time Wait", 
max(tcp_close) AS "TCP Close", 
max(tcp_close_wait) AS "TCP Close Wait", 
max(tcp_last_ack) AS "TCP Last ACK", 
max(tcp_listen) AS "TCP Listen", 
max(tcp_closing) AS "TCP Closing", 
max(tcp_none) AS "TCP None",
max(udp_socket) AS "UDP Sockets"
FROM "netstat" WHERE $timeFilter and "host" =~ /^$host$/ GROUP BY time($interval) fill(null)
SELECT non_negative_derivative(mean("write_bytes"), 10s) FROM "diskio" WHERE "host" =~ /^$host$/  AND "name"= 'vda'  AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval) fill(null)
SELECT non_negative_derivative(mean("read_bytes"), 10s) FROM "diskio" WHERE "host" =~ /^$host$/  AND "name"= 'vda'  AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval) fill(null)
SELECT non_negative_derivative(mean("write_bytes"), 10s) FROM "diskio" WHERE "host" =~ /^$host$/  AND "name"= 'vdb'  AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval) fill(null)
SELECT non_negative_derivative(mean("read_bytes"), 10s) FROM "diskio" WHERE "host" =~ /^$host$/  AND "name"= 'vdb'  AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval) fill(null)
SELECT non_negative_derivative(mean("read_bytes"), 10s)  as "read" FROM "diskio" WHERE "host" =~ /^$host$/  AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval) , "name"  fill(null)
SELECT non_negative_derivative(mean("write_bytes"), 10s)  as "write" FROM "diskio" WHERE "host" =~ /^$host$/  AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval) , "name"  fill(null)
SELECT mean("used_percent") AS "usage" FROM "disk" WHERE "host" =~ /^$host$/ and $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval), "path" fill(null)

panels.description: Percentage of used inodes across mounted filesystems. inodes track files and directories, and when used up no new files nor directories can be created even if there is available disk space.

targets.query: SELECT last("inodes_used")/last("inodes_total") AS "inode usage" FROM "disk" WHERE "host" =~ /^$host$/ and $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval), "path" fill(null)

panels.title: inode Usage

panels.description: Available storage space across all mount points
panels.title: Free Space

targets.query: SELECT mean("usage_idle") FROM "cpu" WHERE "host" =~ /^$host$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval) fill(null)
SELECT mean("usage_iowait") FROM "cpu" WHERE "host" =~ /^$host$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval) fill(null)
SELECT mean("usage_user") FROM "cpu" WHERE "host" =~ /^$host$/ and $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval) fill(null)
SELECT mean("usage_system") FROM "cpu" WHERE "host" =~ /^$host$/ and $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval) fill(null)

list.label: host
list.name: host
list.query: SHOW TAG VALUES FROM "system" WITH KEY = "host"
